ProductInfo.Features:
Display - 4.55 inches TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors (~323 ppi pixel density), - Sony Mobile BRAVIA Engine 2, Shatter proof and scratch-resistant glass
Memory- 8 GB, 2 GB RAM Internal Memory, Expand- microSD, up to 64 GB
Camera-  13.1 MP, 4128x3096 pixels, autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, image stabilization, HDR, sweep panorama, Secondary VGA Camera
OS- Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean), v4.3 (Jelly Bean), planned upgrade to v4.4 (KitKat), Qualcomm Snapdragon APQ8064 CPU,  Quad-core 1.5 GHz Krait
Battrey- Li-ion 2300 mAh battery, Talktime- Up to 13 h (3G), StandBy- Up to 520 h (3G)
